# Grid Auto Flow

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                       | Support     |
| --------------------------- | ----------- |
| `grid-flow-row`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `grid-flow-col`             | 🌐 Web only |
| `grid-flow-dense`           | 🌐 Web only |
| `grid-flow-row-dense`       | 🌐 Web only |
| `grid-flow-col-dense`       | 🌐 Web only |
